connect-facebook.title: Link the account to Facebook

connect-facebook.permissions-title: Why do we get the required permissions:
connect-facebook.permission-reason1: So that we can see all the posts on your page and use them to make the advertisement.
connect-facebook.permission-reason2: So we can help you create ads on Facebook and Instagram.
connect-facebook.permission-reason3: So that we can advertise on our advertising account.
connect-facebook.permission-reason4: So that we can help you respond to your customers’ comments automatically.
connect-facebook.permission-reason5: To help you see all the results of your ads.
